name: Duoc Nguyen
tagline: Pi-shaped engineer: Backend/AI tooling × AI agents/MCP × Product iteration
bio: Engineering Manager at FireGroup by day, building AI-first tools at aiocean.io by night.
Started coding in 2011, spent 13 years shipping products across e-commerce, developer tools, and AI infrastructure.
Founded Vue.js Vietnam community in 2016 when the framework was just taking off.
Most known for obsidian-open-gate (219⭐) - an Obsidian plugin that bridges notes with web integrations,
and jira-mcp (79⭐) - a Go-based MCP server that lets AI agents interact with Jira naturally.
I write about engineering and product thinking at 12bit.vn and onepercent.plus.
Deep focus on Model Context Protocol (MCP), real-time systems, and making developer tools that feel invisible.
Currently building Clik at aiocean.io - exploring how AI agents can make complex workflows simple.
